sources.snippet: .","It allows businesses to pay only for the resources they use, providing cost efficiency and flexibility

sources.title: .","Cloud computing works through large data centers managed by providers who host virtualized resou
sources.snippet: .","Cloud computing works through large data centers managed by providers who host virtualized resources accessible via web portals or APIs, enabling rapid scaling up or down based on demand

sources.title: .","The National Institute of Standards and Technology (NIST) defines cloud computing with five esse
sources.snippet: .","The National Institute of Standards and Technology (NIST) defines cloud computing with five essential characteristics: on-demand self-service, broad network access, resource pooling, rapid elasticity, and measured service

sources.title: .","There are three main types of cloud computing services (service models): Infrastructure as a Ser
sources.snippet: .","There are three main types of cloud computing services (service models): Infrastructure as a Service (IaaS), Platform as a Service (PaaS), and Software as a Service (SaaS)

sources.title: .","Cloud deployment models include Public Cloud, Private Cloud, Hybrid Cloud, and Community Cloud,
sources.snippet: .","Cloud deployment models include Public Cloud, Private Cloud, Hybrid Cloud, and Community Cloud, each differing in ownership, access, and management

sources.title: .","Resource pooling means providers serve multiple consumers with dynamically assigned physical and
sources.snippet: .","Resource pooling means providers serve multiple consumers with dynamically assigned physical and virtual resources, often without consumers knowing the exact resource location

sources.title: .","Rapid elasticity allows resources to be elastically provisioned and released automatically to sc
sources.snippet: .","Rapid elasticity allows resources to be elastically provisioned and released automatically to scale with demand, often appearing unlimited to consumers

sources.title: .","Measured service enables automatic control and optimization of resource use through metering, pr
sources.snippet: .","Measured service enables automatic control and optimization of resource use through metering, providing transparency for both providers and consumers

sources.title: .","Cloud computing supports digital transformation across industries such as healthcare, finance, e
sources.snippet: .","Cloud computing supports digital transformation across industries such as healthcare, finance, education, and manufacturing by providing scalable, secure, and flexible IT infrastructure

sources.title: .","Performance metrics in cloud computing include scalability, availability, latency, throughput, a
sources.snippet: .","Performance metrics in cloud computing include scalability, availability, latency, throughput, and resource utilization efficiency, which are critical for service quality and cost management

sources.title: .","Scalability considerations involve the ability to rapidly provision and release resources to mee
sources.snippet: .","Scalability considerations involve the ability to rapidly provision and release resources to meet fluctuating workloads without service disruption

sources.title: .","Best practices in cloud computing include using multi-region deployments for high availability,
sources.snippet: .","Best practices in cloud computing include using multi-region deployments for high availability, implementing robust security measures, monitoring resource usage, and optimizing costs through usage-based billing

sources.title: .","Cloud computing platforms like Amazon Web Services (AWS), Microsoft Azure, Google Cloud, and Ora
sources.snippet: .","Cloud computing platforms like Amazon Web Services (AWS), Microsoft Azure, Google Cloud, and Oracle Cloud dominate the market and provide comprehensive cloud services and tools

sources.title: .","Cloud computing enables access from heterogeneous devices (mobile phones, tablets, laptops) thro
sources.snippet: .","Cloud computing enables access from heterogeneous devices (mobile phones, tablets, laptops) through standard network mechanisms, supporting broad network access
